extendedInfo.description: This small application allows you to easily edit text documents. You can create a new document (or open an existing text document) to make the necessary changes and save it or send e-mail. The purpose of the application was the need for a simple application to quickly edit text documents and then save and send e-mail. We do not set ourselves the task create large application with lots of functionality. This simple application is easy to perform functions assigned to it.Options:- Select the color of the text;- Select a font;- Select a background color;- Quickly open recent files;- Search the file is open;- Allows you to delete and rename files in Windows Explorer;- Open the e-mail attachments;- File Browser.

reviews.title: Room for Improvement
reviews.comment: It would be great to have a \'clear button\'.
reviews.author: Rosaline Ong

reviews.title: Doesn\'t edit but has a purpose.
reviews.comment: It does highlight links and phone numbers though.
reviews.author: Kelly Sowell

reviews.title: Plagiat
reviews.comment: This is a version of Paul Mach opensource editor. They even can not be installed simultaneously because of duplicated namespaces
reviews.author: Maxim Starikov

reviews.title: No encodings!
reviews.comment: Noooooooo!!!! What an excellent text editor! Nearly perfect! Very clean layout. No annoying tool bars. Good font face/size options. Even background color is configurable. Remembers last opened file and... opens it automatically on next launch! And on the very same line as before!!! Saves and exports. Saves with different name if desired. Attaches to email. Remembers recent files. Absolutely and awesomely excellent except... it doesn\'t support encoding! Many characters in my ISO-8859-1 files (all of them) are truncated. The app is useless to me! Tragedy!
reviews.author: A Google User
